mapper.select:
select a.id, a.category, a.name, a.price, a.active, a.remark, a.cret_dt from web.item a where 1=1
AND
a.name LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
a.category LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
a.remark LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
a.name LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' or a.category LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' or a.remark LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
order by cret_dt
mapper.insert: insert into web.item ( name, price, active, category, remark, cret_dt )values( #{name}, #{price}, #{active}, #{category}, #{remark}, NOW() )
mapper.update: update web.item set name = #{name}, price = #{price}, active = #{active}, category = #{category}, remark = #{remark}, updt_dt = NOW() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select (select count(a.category) from (select category from web.item group by category) as a) as categoryCnt, (select count(name) from web.item) as totalCnt, (select count(name) from web.item where active = 'Y') as activeCnt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO web.item_info (id, item_id, type , detail, active) VALUES (NEXTVAL('web.item_info_id_seq'), #{itemId}, #{type}, #{detail}, #{active}) ON CONFLICT(id) DO UPDATE SET type = #{type}, item_id = #{itemId}, detail = #{detail}, active = #{active}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WEB.item_info WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{id}
